single_crochet into next stitch see diagram 1 1 single_crochet in next 20 stitches at the corner 1 single_crochet into chain 2 space from previous row 1 single_crochet into next chain 2 space from previous row where the dress is folded in half and the corner come together this is the 1st arm hole see diagram 4 & 5 1 single_crochet in the next 43 stitches 1 single_crochet into next chain 2 space from previous row 1 single_crochet into next chain 2 space from previous row creates 2nd arm hole 1 single_crochet into last 20 stitches end round with a slip_stitch into 1st stitch of the round 89
